appetizers.name: chips and queso
appetizers.discription: cripsy tortila chips served with creamy cheese sauce with ground chorizo

appetizers.name: veggie plate
appetizers.discription: variety of cut vegtables with ranch dipping sauce

cold sandwitches.name: turkey club
cold sandwitches.discription: oven roasted turkey with lettuce, tomato, montery jack cheese, bacon , and mayo on white bread.

cold sandwitches.name: cold cut
cold sandwitches.discription: mixed cold cuts such as ham, mortadella, turkey, and capicollo with provolone cheese lettuce and mayo on a hogie roll.

hot sandwitches.name: meatball sub
hot sandwitches.discription: warm meatballs and marinara sauce topped with grated parmesan cheese on a toasted sub roll.

hot sandwitches.name: philly cheese steak
hot sandwitches.discription: thin sliced steak topped with grilled green peppers, onions, and cheese sauce on a toasted sub roll

deserts.name: chocolate chip cookie
deserts.discription: warm cookie with gooey chocolate chips

drinks.name: peach tea
drinks.discription: fresh brewed ice tea infued with peaches and fresh cut peach slices
